posts.post_title: A few odds and ends - T206, T213, Zeenut, Hal Chase ect
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Sean BH
A few odds and ends to clean out:

Everything is sold or on eBay.
Thanks!

First e-mail to hanksta_3@yahoo.com to say I want it gets it.

1917 Zeenut - Hall - VG/EX - No creasing or wrinkles - SOLD

[IMG][IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/hall.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

1931 - Hal Chase negatives and photos; seems Hal was a little on the drunk side and walk in front of one of those darn pesky automobiles. - eBay
[IMG][IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/halchasefinal6-2.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

[IMG][IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/halchasefinal2.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

[IMG][IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/halchasefinal1.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

T206 - Reagan (SL) Card is in VG/EX+ with a minor wrinkle by the back of his head & very Miscut Old Mill Back (can see 3 different backs)- SOLD

[IMG][IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/reagan.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

T213-2 - Quinn & Doolan - Minor wrinkle in each and back damage - SOLD

[IMG][IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/DollanT213.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

[IMG][IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/QuinnT213.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
